textTemplates.name: EmailToHRWhenLeaveCancelledByHR
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!HRName},

This is to inform you that {!HRName} has cancelled {!LeaveType} request of Employee({!$Record.EMS_LM_Contact__r.EMS_RM_Employee_Id__c}) for the following date(s).

 Leave Start Date(s) Leave End Date(s) Status Day
{!NewStartDate}{!NewEndDate} {!Status}{!Day}


Regards,

Cloud Peritus India Pvt. Ltd.

textTemplates.name: EmailToHRwhenLeaveisapprovedbyhim
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!HRName},

The {!LeaveType} request of Employee({!EmployeeID}) for the following date(s) has been {!Status} by {!HRName}.

 Leave Start Date(s) Leave End Date(s) Status Day
{!NewStartDate}{!NewEndDate} {!Status}{!Day}

Remarks: {!$Record.EMS_LM_Remarks__c}


Regards,

Cloud Peritus India Pvt. Ltd.

textTemplates.name: EmailToHrWhenleaveisRejected
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!HRName},

The {!LeaveType} request of Employee ({!EmployeeID}) for the following date(s) has been {!Status} by {!HRName}.

 Leave Start Date(s) Leave End Date(s) Status Day
{!NewStartDate}{!NewEndDate} {!Status}{!Day}

Remarks: {!$Record.EMS_LM_Remarks__c}


Regards,

Cloud Peritus India Pvt. Ltd.

textTemplates.name: SendEmailwhenHrupdatestheleaverequest
textTemplates.text:
Dear Employee

Your Leave Request has been modified by HR.

 Leave Request Date(s) Modified Leave Request Date(s) Status Day
{!OldStartDate} To {!OldEndDate}{!NewStartDate} To {!NewEndDate} {!Status}{!Day}

Reason:


Regards,

Cloud Peritus India Pvt. Ltd.
